name: spule
author: Logan Powell
description: a state management library for single page applications

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build examples/integration/index.html -d spule --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url ./
scripts.docs: npm run types && npm run jsdoc
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run docs && npm run pages && npm publish
scripts.tests: npm run types && npm run madge && jest
scripts.postgit: git push origin master && npm run patch
scripts.start: npm run types && parcel examples/integration/index.html --global md -p 8080 --open -d dist watch
